title: Wall Street Breakfast September 7: Blackrock's Larry Fink Says Government Spending, Immigration, Remote Work Fuel Inflation
author: Seeking Alpha

description: BlackRock's Larry Fink says government spending, remote work fuel inflation. Apple expected to unveil new iPhones, Apple Watches, AirPods at September event. Good news may be bad news for stocks as September losing streak continues. Catch today’s WSB article seekingalpha.com/wsb.
